name: BadLands RoadTrip (itch)
description:
BadLands RoadTrip is a physics-based shooter, open world RPG where you build your own weapons to fight against the robot apocalypse! Assemble your gun to fit YOUR OWN playstyle, and give those androids a much needed hard reset. Join your friends via LAN multiplayer and go on quests together, or just fiddle around with gun setups all day!

This is the pre-alpha concept demo for BadLands RoadTrip, to accompany our Kickstarter campaign. You can already play around with all of the mechanics, experience part of the story, and enjoy multiplayer LAN with an unlimited amount of other gamers. It is still missing a couple of things, such as:

  • The world will be 4 times as big
  • More quests
  • More gun parts

If you want to stream playing of this game, please do. All music is our own, so there is no need to mute.

If you want to stay up to date, please follow us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter or subscribe to our dev vlog on Youtube.

Please, let us know what you think of the game, and report any bugs you might encounter.  If you need help building your gun, talk to the gun experts next to the gun benches. Have fun!

Default controls:

In-game menu: Escape

Move: WSAD

Jump: space

Run: shift

Interact with benches and NPC's: e

Shoot main gun (right): left mouse button

Reload main gun: r

Shoot alt gun (left): right mouse button

Reload alt gun: q

Show map and questlog: m
